articles.author: Chris Bumbaca
articles.title: USWNT's future is now as Big Three produce big results at Paris Olympics - USA TODAY
articles.description: Mallory Swanson, Sophia Smith and Trinity Rodman, the future of the U.S. women's national team, have scored six of the Americans' seven goals.
articles.content:
MARSEILLE, France The future of the United States womens national team, at least when it comes to scoring goals, rests with forwards Mallory Swanson, Sophia Smith and Trinity Rodman.
